author: kskovpen
body:
#### PR description:

First implementation of tau embedding wfs in the relval machinery, following the discussion at the PPD meeting: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1146289/contributions/4811411/attachments/2426987/4155240/PPD-Embedding-2022-04-14.pdf. One wf (136.9) is introduced in a separate tauembed definition or relvals that will be used for tests in the production system.

#### PR validation:

The new wf runs fine locally.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport.
title: Implementation of tau embedding in relval wfs
